long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
XVM Wallet is a browser-extension wallet for Bitcoin and its execution layer 0xVM.

Key Features:
- Self-custodial: Your private keys are encrypted on your device by your password and never shared with anyone.
- Asset Management: Send and receive BTC and 0xVM assets easily.
- Wrap/Unwrap: Seamlessly convert between BTC and xBTC.
- Seamless dApp Integration: Connect to dApps on 0xVM, the modular execution layer on Bitcoin.

Why Choose XVM Wallet:
- Security: Industry-leading encryption for your digital assets.
- User-Friendly: Intuitive interface for Bitcoin and 0xVM operations.
- Innovative: Stay at the forefront of Bitcoin ecosystem developments.
- All-in-One: Manage all your Bitcoin network needs in one wallet.

Download XVM Wallet to start exploring the new future of the Bitcoin ecosystem today!
